item.description: Sat (23)-07-2022-20:17 Type: #quote Tags: If you only focus on connections that are already made you’ll never create something new https://www.

Sat (23)-07-2022-20:12 Type: #quote Tags: There’s no such thing as Disciplines. Everything is the Universe Everything is a relationship of things on top of other things that increase the complexity of a system.

item.title: In life the goal is not to learn as much as possible, is to do as much as possible
item.description: Type: #quote Tags: productivity [[personal]] In life the goal is not to learn as much as possible, is to do as much as possible In life the goal is not to learn as much as possible, is to do as much as possible
